Package com.hexanome16.server.services.auth

Interface AuthServiceInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
AuthService
public interface AuthServiceInterface
Interface for authentication service associated with our game server.

    • getPlayer

      @ResponseBody org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> getPlayer(String accessToken)
      Sends a request to Lobby Service to get the username associated with the passed access token.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - The access token of the user.
      Returns:
      The username associated with the passed access token, null if not found.

    • logout

      org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Void> logout(String accessToken)
      This request logs out the user in LS associated with the access token.
      Parameters:
      accessToken - The access token.
      Returns:
      the response entity

    • verifyPlayer

      boolean verifyPlayer(long sessionId, String accessToken, Map<Long,Game> gameMap)
      Verify player by their access token.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - ID of session associated with request
      accessToken - access token of request
      gameMap - mapping from ID's to their respective game
      Returns:
      true if access token is in game with session ID, false otherwise.
